mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_message(notice_message_no, sender, receiver, notice_message_type, notice_message_detail, post_no, tree_no, forest_no, notice_reg_date,post_image,profile_no ) VALUES(seq_notice_message_no.nextval,#{sender},#{receiver}, #{noticeMessageType}, #{noticeMessageDetail}, #{postNo}, #{treeNo}, #{forestNo}, SYSDATE,#{postImage},#{profileNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS row_seq, m.* FROM( SELECT m1.* FROM NOTICE_MESSAGE m1 WHERE TREE_NO =#{treeNo} AND notice_message_type !=3 AND profile_no IN (#{profileNo},0) ORDER BY m1.NOTICE_REG_DATE DESC) m WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS row_seq, m.* FROM( SELECT m1.* FROM NOTICE_MESSAGE m1 WHERE forest_no =#{forestNo} AND notice_message_type =3 ORDER BY m1.NOTICE_REG_DATE DESC) m WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(notice_message_state) FROM notice_message WHERE tree_no = #{treeNo} AND notice_message_type != '3' AND NOTICE_MESSAGE_STATE = '0' AND profile_no IN (#{profileNo},0)
SELECT COUNT(notice_message_state) FROM notice_message WHERE forest_no = #{value} AND notice_message_type = '3' AND NOTICE_MESSAGE_STATE = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_message SET notice_message_state = '1' WHERE tree_no =#{treeNo} AND notice_message_type !='3' AND profile_no IN(#{profileNo},0)
UPDATE notice_message SET notice_message_state = '1' WHERE forest_no =#{value} AND notice_message_type ='3'
